General.Name: G Capital Bhd
General.Description: G Capital Berhad, an investment holding company, provides transportation services in Malaysia. The company operates through five segments: Transportation, Mini-Hydropower, Solarpower, Water, and Investment Holding and Others. It charters its fleet of land-based passenger transportation assets and specialty vehicles. The company also engages in the wholesale of pharmaceutical and medical goods. In addition, it develops, maintains, operates, and deals in hydropower and hydroelectric activities. Further, the company provides management consultancy, information technology, facilities management, manpower suppling, engineering consultancy, and supply and installation services. Additionally, it engages in the generation of renewable energy, and environment and green technology; and supplying, installation, and operating of solar photovoltaic electric power generation systems. The company was formerly known as Gunung Capital Berhad and changed its name to G Capital Berhad in August 2020. G Capital Berhad was incorporated in 1995 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
